name: Woof (Kunabee)
description:
My dream is to make games and be an author.  One thing I tend to do is get over-ambitious.

Bitsy caused those ambitions to settle down, and I was able to make something super short and, in my opinion, super cute.

It's just a dog.  Good morning, puppy!

Arrow keys or mouse to move.

Quick tip: Move down when your avatar disappears.  There are two parts to Human's bed.
